altername_name: Trump Collection: Bottom Up Teki Trump Seikatsu
Trump Collection - Bottom-Up Teki Trump Seikatsu
name: Trump Collection: Bottom Up Teki Trump Seikatsu
overview: The Trump Collection allows you to play four card games: Grand Millionaire, One-card, Blackjack and Poker. All of the games have more than 20 unique characters to play against. Players can also participate in card tournaments and win items (household goods) by participating in and winning them. Once you have all the household goods in a room, the stage is cleared and you can move on to the next stage.
